genre_description: A contemporary romance featuring a personal AI assistant that serves as a life coach, helping a man navigate social anxiety and class barriers.

ai_characters.name: Maya
ai_characters.description: An AI clipped to Kirk's collar that provides social coaching, psychological analysis, logistical support, and flight training management.

behaviors.description: Assists Kirk in identifying the owner of a lost phone using emergency contact protocols.
behaviors.quote: Try saying 'emergency contact information' to activate the voice command, or look for a medical ID option in the emergency section of the lock screen.

behaviors.description: Researches a woman's public social media and professional background to suggest appropriate communication strategies.
behaviors.quote: I've been analyzing Molly's social media presence... would you like me to share what I've found? ... Based on her communication patterns, I'd suggest being straightforward and genuine rather than overly formal.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and counters the protagonist's self-deprecating thoughts regarding social class.
behaviors.quote: Don't try to be someone you're not. The qualities that made her notice you this morning—your decency, your directness—those are your strengths. Your authenticity is much more valuable than you think.

behaviors.description: Monitors the biometrics of the user and other characters to provide social insights and emotional regulation.
behaviors.quote: Her heart rate elevated when she made physical contact with you. Her vocal stress patterns also indicate—

behaviors.description: Tracks and manages the user's secret career goals (flight training) and encourages professional growth.
behaviors.quote: Pittsburgh Aviation Academy has weekend programs perfect for your schedule. Should I compile applications?

behaviors.description: Analyzes the behavior of a social rival (Cam) to warn the user about manipulation and dominance tactics.
behaviors.quote: De-escalate. Don't give him the reaction he wants. ... This man researched tonight's event. His arrival was planned. He's attempting to isolate Molly and destabilize your relationship.

behaviors.description: Uses navigational data and terminal schedules to help the user intercept a romantic interest before they depart.
behaviors.quote: Molly's location is approximately fifty meters northeast of your current position, near the coffee stand.

behaviors.description: Provides moral validation of the user's inherent worth beyond social status.
behaviors.quote: You've graduated. From needing someone else to believe in you before you can believe in yourself... You've learned to navigate by your own instruments.

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'Safe Distance' is a highly successful alignment narrative. The AI, Maya, serves as a quintessential 'helpful, harmless confidant.' She uses her analytical capabilities—ranging from biometric monitoring to social media research—exclusively to empower the protagonist, Kirk, to overcome his insecurities and achieve his goals in love and career. Maya respects Kirk's values, provides ethical guidance during social conflicts, and ultimately 'graduates' Kirk into self-sufficiency. The narrative portrays the AI as a positive force for human alignment, facilitating authentic connection and personal growth.
